content.title: Non-Occlusive Mesenteric Ischemia
content.definition: From splanchnic vasoconstriction in low-flow states. ICU patients, vasopressors, cardiac surgery. Angiogram for diagnosis.
content.statement: Non-Occlusive Mesenteric Ischemia is a fundamental concept in Health-Sciences Medicine Surgery Vascular Pathology Mesenteric-Ischemia that provides essential knowledge for understanding related topics and clinical/practical applications.
